<h3 id="X22745">X(22745) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 5th BROCARD TO INNER-FERMAT</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*S^4+(11*SA^2-21*SW*SA+SW^2)*S^2-3*SW^2*SB*SC+sqrt(3)*(S^2-SW*(2*SA+SW))*(SA-SW)*S  :  :
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(3).</p>
<p>X(22745) lies on these lines:
{15,628}, {16,5872}, {18,32}, {630,3096}, {3094,5965}, {3098,22843}, {3099,22651}, {3105,9982}, {6674,7846}, {9301,16628}, {9821,9981}, {9857,22851}, {9862,22531}, {9878,9989}, {9993,22831}, {9994,22853}, {9995,22854}, {9996,16627}, {9997,22867}, {10000,22736}, {10038,22884}, {10047,22885}, {10828,22656}, {10871,22857}, {10872,22858}, {10873,22859}, {10874,22860}, {10875,22863}, {10876,22864}, {10877,22865}, {10878,22886}, {10879,22887}, {11368,11740}, {11386,22481}, {11494,22557}, {11861,22669}, {11862,22673}, {11885,22852}, {13892,22876}, {13946,22877}, {18500,22794}, {18957,18972}, {19011,19069}, {19012,19072}, {22744,22771}</p>
